thread.title: The Chainsmokers, Dillon Francis, Marshmello & More Celebrate Valentine's Day – Or Don't
thread.title_full: The Chainsmokers, Dillon Francis, Marshmello & More Celebrate Valentine's Day – Or Don't

author: Kat Bein
title: The Chainsmokers, Dillon Francis, Marshmello & More Celebrate Valentine's Day – Or Don't
text:
COMMENTS Chelsea Lauren/WireImage Dillon Francis performs during the Hard Summer Music Festival at Fairplex on Aug. 1, 2015 in Pomona, Calif. 
Are you feeling the love today or are you feeling lonely? If you're crying into a heart-shaped box of chocolates, snap out of it. You're never alone, not in the world of social media. Some of your favorite DJs are as unhappy about Valentine's Day as you are. Others are finding room in their hearts to spread positivity with the entire world. 
You don't have to catch feelings to have a good time on V-Day. Just catch some laughs, and maybe even some inspiration, by reading these DJ tweets.
